title: Women representation in the literature department
summary: This chart shows the percentage of Women represented in various departments in a school .
It shows Engineering is at the top at 70 percentage , while Literature is at the bottom at 23 percentage .
In between these are Computer_Science at 60 percentage , Mathematics at 55 percentage and Arts at 32 percentage .
gold: The following graph show the percentage representation of women in the literature department . Engineering has the most representation at 70 % . Literature has the lowest percent representation at 22 % .
